CustomField.description: Indicates if the SLA has been breached
CustomField.formula:
OR(
AND(
Name != "SLA Fiber Technician Booked", SLA_Time_Elapsed__c > SLA_Breach_Threshold__c , ISNULL( SLA_Stop_Time__c )
),
AND(
Name = "SLA Fiber Technician Booked", ISBLANK(Activation_line__r.SAP_PR_no__c), (TODAY() + 6) > Activation_line__r.AL_Planned_Delivery_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: SLA Breach
